name: ceo-of-one
description: CEO of One - AI-powered chief of staff for solo CEOs

scripts.background:
echo 'To run a Cursor background agent:
1. Open Cursor IDE
2. Press Cmd+Shift+P (Mac) or Ctrl+Shift+P (Windows)
3. Type: Cursor: Start Background Agent
4. Paste the prompt from the orchestrator

Alternatively, in Cursor terminal: cursor-agent --prompt "YOUR_PROMPT"'

author: Utlyze
